This randomized , placebo-controlled , double-blind , pilot study compare efficacy safety isotretinoin versus placebo treat subject toxic epidermal necrolysis ( TEN ) . Approximately 40 subject satisfy inclusion exclusion criterion randomly assign 1:1 ratio either isotretinoin placebo take 14 day . The end study define time subject discharge hospital . Participants primarily assess percent body surface affect ( BSA ) number day hospitalization .
